data.title: SWOT Anlaysis Disney-3
data.meta_description: SWOT Anlaysis Disney-3 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides an analysis of The Walt Disney Company. It discusses the company's history beginning as a small animation studio in 1923. Today, Disney is a large multinational conglomerate with annual revenues of $45 billion. The analysis describes Disney's organizational structure and its five business segments: media networks, parks and resorts, studio entertainment, Disney consumer products, and Disney interactive. It also discusses Disney's mission, brands, competitors in different segments, and its strategies to adapt to changing media consumption trends.
